'''Otogi Wood Granary Cart''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Otogi Wood Granary Cart is obtainable from [[Netsuke no Gen Crafts]] for 5 [[Electro Sigil]].
